job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: This innovative AI start up is looking for a Site Reliability Engineer to join their growing team The company monitors AI after it is live to track any discrepancies or biases that hadnt been recognized already They have their Series A and set up for a lot of growth and successbrbrAs an SRE you will be heavily leveraging Kubernetes and working closely with the data and machine learning teams You will be interacting with a variety of infrastructures depending the user so familiarity with both cloud and on premise will be helpfulbrbrstronguRequired Skills amp Experiencebrustrongul li4 years of relevant experienceli liExperience with Kubernetesli liExperience working with big data andor machine learningli liFamiliarity with both cloud and data center infrastructuresli brulThe Offerbrul liCompetitive Salary Up to 155Kyear DOEli liBonus li liEquityli brbrulstronguYou Will Receive The Following Benefitsbrustrongul liMedical Insurance amp Health Savings Account HSAli li401kli liPaid Sick Time Leaveli liPretax Commuter Benefitli brulApplicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a fulltime basis now and in the futurebrbrstrongPosted Bystrong Jordan Taylor
